content: in this legal case a lawsuit claim regarding a coownership community and a specific property was rejected by the municipal court makarska the court dissolved the coownership and transferred ownership of a portion of the property to the plaintiff the plaintiff was ordered to pay the defendant the market value of another portion of the property within 15 days the defendant now has a lien on the property and can register this lien in the land registry the plaintiff is also authorized to register ownership rights for another property and remove the defendants name from it additionally the defendant has been ordered to reimburse the plaintiff for litigation costs the decision was made based on article 33 of the law the plaintiff initially filed a lawsuit against the defendant for harassment on november 5 2021 on january 6 2022 the plaintiff decided to waive their claim and requested the court to issue a judgment based on this waiver however the defendants consent was required for the claim to be waived the court made a decision based on article 331a of the civil procedure act
